sent.orig: Nowadays, TV plays are rarely worth watching.
sent.trans: 眼下值得一看的电视剧很少。

sent.orig: Nowadays a good headhunter is as important as good staffs.
sent.trans: 在今天的社会，好的猎头和好的员工一样重要。

sent.orig: More and more enterprises are nowadays overcautious in the new car fixed price aspect, gingerly.
sent.trans: 现今越来越多的企业在新车定价方面谨小慎微，战战兢兢。

sent.orig: In China nowadays, curriculums in Secondary Vocational Schools (SVS) get into embarrassed situation.
sent.trans: 目前我国的中等职业教育课程陷入了一种十分尴尬的境地。

sent.orig: Nowadays, her song are so popular are played the radio every day.
sent.trans: 现在，她的歌十分走红，每天都在电台播放。
